topic: C-H bond activation mechanisms and applications in heterogeneous catalysis: From isolated metal centers on oxide materials to selective alkane oxidation
QuestionEnglish: How do isolated metal centers on oxide materials facilitate C-H bond activation in heterogeneous catalysis, what mechanisms (such as Mars van Krevelen and H-abstraction) are involved in these processes, and how are these principles applied in industrial selective oxidation of alkanes, using the conversion of butane to maleic anhydride as a specific example?
QuestionChinese: 在多相催化中，氧化物材料上的孤立金属中心如何促进C-H键活化，这些过程涉及哪些机制（如Mars van Krevelen和氢原子抽取机制），以及这些原理如何应用于工业选择性烷烃氧化，以丁烷转化为马来酸酐为具体例子？
